com.facebook.litho.viewcompat

Class SimpleViewBinder<V extends View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.viewcompat.SimpleViewBinder<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewBinder<V>

    public class SimpleViewBinder<V extends View>
extends Object
implements ViewBinder<V>
    Empty implementation of ViewBinder. This can be useful if we need to override only one method.

      void bind(V view)
      Binds data to the given view so it can be rendered on screen.
      void prepare()
      Prepares the binder to be bound to a view.
      void unbind(V view)
      Cleans up a view that goes off screen after it has already been bound.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Description copied from interface: ViewBinder
        Prepares the binder to be bound to a view.

        Use this method to perform calculations ahead of time and save them.

        Specified by:
        prepare in interface ViewBinder<V extends View>

      • bind

        public void bind(V view)
        Description copied from interface: ViewBinder
        Binds data to the given view so it can be rendered on screen. This will always be called after prepare so that you can use stored output from prepare here if needed.
        Specified by:
        bind in interface ViewBinder<V extends View>
        Parameters:
        view - the view to bind.

      • unbind

        public void unbind(V view)
        Description copied from interface: ViewBinder
        Cleans up a view that goes off screen after it has already been bound.
        Specified by:
        unbind in interface ViewBinder<V extends View>
        Parameters:
        view - the view to unbind.
